mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.name AS category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.name like '%'||#{find}||'%' ORDER BY p.name ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products(product_id, category_id, name, price, summary, image_url) VALUES(#{productId}, #{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{summary}, #{imageUrl})
